nodes.text: The Thundering Herd was an All Terrain Armored Transport unit of the Imperial Army under the command of General Maximilian Veers during the Galactic Civil War. The armored fleet of walkers participated at the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.

Composed of the first AT-AT walkers, the elite unit from the Raithal Academy trained under Major General Maximilian Veers in planetary assaults. Hand-picked by Veers, the unit went on to become the core of Blizzard Force which was victorious at the Battle of Hoth.
